titles.title: From Pole To Pole Let Others Roam (easy sweet)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From pole to pole let others roam And serach in vain for bliss My soul is satisfied at home The Lord my portion is{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus who on His glorious throne Rules heaven and earth and sea Is pleased to claim me for His own And give Himself for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His person fixes all my love His blood removes my fear And while He pleads for me above His arm preserves me here{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His word of promise is my food His spirit is my guide Thus daily is my strength renewed And all my wants supplied{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For Him I count as gain each loss Disgrace for Him renown Well may I glory in His cross While He prepares my crown{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let worldlings then indulge their boast How much they gain or spend Their joys must soon give up the ghost But mine shall know no end{/lang-eng}
